help-file.title: "BIGBYS CRUSHING HAND" "BIGBY'S CRUSHING HAND"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
This powerful spell causes an enormous, muscular-looking hand to appear before the caster. The hand grabs its victim and squeezes with a mighty force, causing the victim to suffer extensive bodily damage from broken bones and internal injuries.
